select.if: SELECT (CASE WHEN (CONVERT(SUBSTRING(a.employeeNo, 4) , SIGNED) + 1) <10 THEN CONCAT('LYC00', (CONVERT( SUBSTRING(a.employeeNo, 4) , SIGNED) + 1)) WHEN (CONVERT( SUBSTRING(a.employeeNo, 4) , SIGNED) + 1 >=10) AND (CONVERT( SUBSTRING(a.employeeNo, 4) , SIGNED) + 1 <100) THEN CONCAT('LYC0', (CONVERT( SUBSTRING(a.employeeNo, 4) , SIGNED) + 1)) ELSE CONCAT('LYC', (CONVERT( SUBSTRING(a.employeeNo, 4) , SIGNED) + 1)) END) AS employeeNo FROM employee a WHERE employeeNo = (SELECT MAX(employeeNo) FROM employee);
